TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed NavigationMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of navigation that is taking place NavigationMode is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.NavigationMode%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode Back = unsigned int8(1)

Docs.summary: Navigating back to the most recent content in back navigation history. This occurs when the **GoBack** method is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode Forward = unsigned int8(2)

Docs.summary: Navigating to the most recent content on forward navigation history. This occurs when the **GoForward** method is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode New = unsigned int8(0)

Docs.summary: Navigating to new content. This occurs when the **Navigate** method is called, or when **Source** property is set.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode Refresh = unsigned int8(3)

Docs.summary: Reloading the current content. This occurs when the **Refresh** method is called.
